name: Down The Mine
description:
The last remaining survivor of the grand chicken massacre have fled underground. Help them outrun their past life in this action-packed endless runner. Avoid obstacles and collect coins at an ever-growing speed. The faster you go the more points you earn!

#scorejam

Instructions:

  • Use A, S, D or the arrow keys to control the cart
  • Press ESC to exit the game

Installation (Windows):

  • Download the .zip file
  • Extract all contents to a separate folder
  • Run "DownTheMine.exe"
